metadata.title: CVE-2018-5206 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
When the channel topic is set without specifying a sender, Irssi before1.0.6 may dereference a NULL pointer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5206` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.15-5ubuntu3.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.15-5ubuntu3.4').
